title: Developer and DevOps Engineer with Extensive Experience - Upwork
description: We are currently looking for a highly skilled and versatile developer and devops engineer to join our dynamic team. As a key member of our software development and deployment team, you will play a crucial role in the design, development, testing, and deployment of innovative software applications. To excel in this role, you should have extensive experience in software development, with a deep understanding of both development and operations. You will need to leverage your expertise in various programming languages and frameworks to create cutting-edge solutions that meet our clients' needs. In addition to your technical skills, you should be well-versed in utilizing various DevOps tools and methodologies. This will enable you to streamline our development processes, automate workflows, and improve the efficiency and reliability of our software deployments. Your proficiency in version control systems will be invaluable in ensuring smooth collaboration and effective management of our codebase. A strong understanding of the software development life cycle is essential, as you will be responsible for guiding projects from conception to completion. You should be comfortable working in an agile environment, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions within tight deadlines. Key Responsibilities: - Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and define project scope - Design and develop software applications using industry best practices and coding standards - Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure software quality and stability - Implement continuous integration and deployment strategies to automate software delivery - Monitor and optimize the performance of software applications - Troubleshoot and resolve issues throughout the software development life cycle - Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to drive innovation and improvement Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field - Proven experience as a developer and devops engineer with a track record of successful software development and deployment projects - Proficiency in multiple programming languages such as Java, Python, C#, or JavaScript - Strong understanding of various frameworks, such as Spring, Django, .NET, or Node.js - Familiarity with popular DevOps tools, including Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Ansible, or Chef - Experience with version control systems like Git or SVN - Knowledge of agile methodologies and their application in software development - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail If you are a motivated and innovative individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and contribute to the development of groundbreaking software solutions that make a real impact in the industry. lambda, dynamodb. SQSSkills: Amazon Web Services, Docker, DevOps, Git, Python

title: Full-Stack Developer for Decentralized Healthcare Information Exchange App - Upwork
description: Design and develop smart contracts in Solidity for the Ethereum blockchain, ensuring secure, efficient, and scalable functionality for healthcare information exchange. Strong proficiency in Python and JavaScript (Node.js), with experience in using Web3.py or Web3.js for blockchain interactions. Familiarity with the Open Health Stack and its application in developing healthcare solutions is highly desirable. Experience with Pulumi or similar infrastructure-as-code (IaC) tools for managing cloud resources. Understanding of decentralized applications (DApps) architecture and the unique security considerations for blockchain-based applications. Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Strong communication skills, capable of effectively collaborating with team members and stakeholders remotely. A detailed CV highlighting relevant experience. A cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for this project. Links to previous blockchain projects, especially those in healthcare or related fields, if available. Availability and preferred contract terms. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis until the position is filled. We're looking for passionate, innovative individuals who share our vision for a transformed healthcare industry. If you're ready to contribute to a cutting-edge project at the intersection of blockchain and healthcare, we'd love to hear from you.Skills: JavaScript, Node.js, Python, DApps, Solidity, Blockchain Development

Tasks: For simplicity, I would like to start this process from scratch so I know how to get it done going forward. 1. Create a new Nx workspace 2. Create a Next.js project in the workspace, possibly with the @nx/next plugin 3. Create a Nest.js api in the workspace, possibly, using the @nx/nest plugin 4. Install puppeteer 5. Scrape any random page, and return a string (This is just as a proof of concept to show puppeteer is actually working) 6. Prepare a Dockerfile for Next.js and another one for the Nest.js API 7. Prepare a Docker Compose file 8. Build the containers (Docker compose up build or sth). 9. Test the Nextjs Application and the Nest.js Puppeteer API. 10. title: evelopment of a Text-to-Audio Mobile App with Puppeteer and Credit Management - Upwork
description: Description: We are seeking an expert Flutter and Firebase (or Supabase) developer to develop a comprehensive mobile application. This app will enable users to convert text to audio, utilizing Puppeteer on the server-side and incorporating a paid credit system. Expected Features: Client-Side (Flutter): - See specification screenshots attached for the expected result - A single page application of iOS and Android where you can write something and get it in audio. - Each text conversion to audio costs 1 credit. - Every new user has 10 free credits. - To buy credits, we use Stripe Checkout - Each audio generated is added to the list (last below) and can be heard through the player by taping on the audio. Server-Side (Firebase/Supabase): - Reception and processing of submitted texts. - Credit balance check for conversion eligibility. - Utilizing Puppeteer to:   - Launch a headless browser.   - Display the text in the console.   - Send a hard-coded audio file (same for all texts).   - Save and return the audio file URL to the client.   - Deduct one credit per conversion. - Integration of Stripe Checkout for credit purchases. Essential Skills: - Proficiency in mobile application development with Flutter. - Experience with Firebase or Supabase. - Ability to develop standalone backends. - Handling HTTP requests and file upload/download processes. - Knowledge of Puppeteer for task automation. - Integration with Stripe Checkout payment API. Deliverables: - A fully functional Flutter app for iOS and Android. - Complete source code for both frontend and backend. - Implemented credit management system (purchasing and spending). - Installation and usage documentation. Please feel free to reach out with any additional questions. The initial Puppeteer script will be simple, with plans for future enhancements.Skills: Firebase, Smartphone, Mobile App Development, FlutterFlow, Supabase, Back-End Development

title: USB Keyboard Firmware Optimization - Upwork
description: Modify existing software intended for the BB Q20 keyboard, using I2C puppet, specifically key presses, trackpad state, and more, to apply to Android operating system. Here are some examples: [KEYBOARD BUTTON = ANDROID FUNCTION] BACK = BACK MENU = HOME (SINGLE PRESS) HANG UP = CRTL CALL = RECENT APPS -HOLD 'CRTL'  + [BELOW BUTTON, SHORT-PRESS OR LONG-PRESS THIS BUTTON, ACTIVATE APPS/SHORTCUTS/ETC. I.E  A QUICKLAUNCH] -SHORT PRESS ITEMS- CUT= X COPY = C PASTE = V SELECT ALL = A ONE WORD DELETE = D UNDO = Z REDO = Y CAPS = T NUM LOCK = N HOME [CURSOR PLACEMENT] = H PGDN = U PGUP = 0 END = E NEXT WORD = W PREVIOUS WORD = P SAVE = S SHARE = R MOVE CURSOR FORWARD ONE SPACE = F MOVE CURSOR BACKWARD ONE SPACE = G OTHER QL SHORTCUTS -SINGLE PRESS CTRL, THEN OTHER BUTTON = ACTIVATE APPS OR OTHER SHORTCUTS- --ideally we can make an interface on android to assign each of these values--Skills: Raspberry Pi Firmware, Firmware Programming

title: Azure Administrator - Upwork
description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Azure Administrator to join our IT team. This role is pivotal in managing and overseeing our organization's Azure cloud environment. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Azure services, including PaaS, SaaS, and IaaS, and possess a deep understanding of Azure Resource Manager, RBAC, and identity and access controls. As an Azure Administrator, you will be responsible for creating, configuring, and maintaining Azure resources, ensuring high availability, and optimizing performance across our cloud infrastructure. Key Responsibilities:   - Azure Resource Management: Create, configure, and manage Azure resources using the Azure portal, ensuring optimal performance and compliance with organizational standards.   - Service Expertise: Demonstrate expertise in Azure PaaS, SaaS, and IaaS services, utilizing them effectively to meet business needs and enhance infrastructure capabilities.   - Security and Access Management: Implement and manage Azure RBAC, identity, and access controls to ensure secure access to cloud resources, safeguarding sensitive data and systems.   - Infrastructure as Code: Develop and maintain Terraform code for efficient and scalable deployment of Azure resources, fostering an infrastructure-as-code culture within the organization.   - Troubleshooting and Support: Proactively monitor the Azure environment to identify and troubleshoot issues, ensuring high availability and minimal downtime.   - Continuous Learning and Improvement: Stay abreast of the latest Azure features and updates, continuously seeking ways to improve the environment and processes. Qualifications:   - Experience: At least 2 years of direct experience managing and supporting Azure environments. - Technical Skills: Proficiency in Azure services (PaaS, SaaS, IaaS), Azure Resource Manager, RBAC, identity and access management, and Terraform. -   Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to resolve complex technical issues efficiently. -  Communication: Excellent communication and collaboration skills, capable of working effectively in a team environment and interacting with all levels of the organization.   - Certifications: Azure Administrator Associate certification or other relevant Azure certifications preferred.Skills: Azure DevOps, Cloud Architecture, Cloud Engineering, Cloud Engineering Consultation, Cloud Implementation, Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Active Directory, Azure App Service, Microsoft Windows PowerShell, Terraform

title: AWS Lightsail to GCP Migration - Upwork
description: I have an AWS Lightsail instance running on Ubuntu. I have installed multiple libraries and packages on this instance. Many of these libraries had to have specific modifications to run. I would like to migrate this instance, as is, from AWS Lightsail to GCP. The new instance on GCP should run all the libraries as they are currently run on AWS. I am looking for someone to guide me through the process, in real time, as I do the migration. Skills: Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, Linux

title: AWS Architect - Upwork
description: We are seeking an experienced AWS Architect to design, implement, and manage our AWS infrastructure. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of AWS services and proven experience in architecting scalable and secure solutions. As an AWS Architect, you will be responsible for analyzing our current infrastructure, identifying areas for improvement, and designing cost-effective and efficient solutions. Additionally, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation and maintenance of the architecture. Strong communication and problem-solving skills are essential for this role. Responsibilities: - Designing and implementing scalable and secure AWS solutions - Analyzing current infrastructure and recommending improvements - Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure successful implementation - Monitoring and managing AWS resources - Troubleshooting and resolving issues Requirements: - Proven experience as an AWS Architect - Deep understanding of AWS services - Knowledge of infrastructure as code tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation - Strong problem-solving and communication skills - AWS certifications are a plusSkills: Amazon Web Services, Amazon EC2, AWS CloudFormation, Amazon ECS, Amazon S3

title: Senior DevOps Engineer - Upwork
description: We are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer with experience in terraform, AWS, EKS, and observability. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in cloud infrastructure and automation, and will be responsible for deploying, managing, and monitoring our infrastructure on AWS using tools like Terraform. In addition, they will be involved in setting up and managing our Kubernetes clusters on EKS. Experience with observability tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack is essential. If you are a self-motivated and experienced DevOps professional with strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication, and the ability to work autonomously, we would love to hear from you.Skills: DevOps, Docker, Kubernetes, Amazon Web Services, CI/CD
